channel.title: Firemaking!
channel.description:
I believe it's 60-80% done. I am working with a P.I based server.
I have the right animation, but it won't reset for some reason. "resetAnim= true" I can fix this myself in a little bit of time. If you have the fix, it's greatly appreciated. (Saves me time).
I got him to walk back after he makes a fire, just one space. I added a 1.25 second delay, because the delay before was not working at all. The problem is, how do I clip him from walking through a wall?
I could also find a way around it, and patch it. It just takes time, once again it's greatly appreciated if you have the fix.

Look at the clipped following, and work off it I guess.

item.title: Firemaking!
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

C++ Imbued:

I believe c.startAnimation(65535); Resets the Animation

Without even testing it, I know it will just cancel the previous animation.
Any who, I’ll test it if I’m wrong.

Read full topic
